title: Syndromic Surveillance System for MERS-CoV as New Early Warning and Identification Approach [Corrigendum]
body:
Salamatbakhsh M, Mobaraki K, Ahmadzadeh J. Risk Manag Healthc Policy. 2020;13:93–95.

The authors have advised that the date shown on page 93, main text, line 5 “23.09.2017 to 26.07.2019” should read “23.09.2012 to 26.07.2019”. The authors apologize for this error.
